page.title: 12BOSTON W. LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content: We have a{sports centre}in our area it is called the{Peter Paine.}The reason it is called that is in memory of a {mayor in Boston called Peter Paine.The facilities we have are:Roller skating, Gym club, Badminton, Volleyball, Basketball, Netball, Judo, Tennis, Football, Squash, Multigym Weight-training, Table tennis, Trampolining.There is also a{private {sports club,it is called the {Mayflower.The facilities in the {Mayflower are:Squash,Hockey,Rifle-Range,Archery, Keepfit,Football,Cricket.There is also an indoor Bowling Club but you have to be over 18 to{join.The Tennis Club}is} on the main road. You are also allowed to go three times as a guest.Then you can join if you like it.In our area there are no facilities where you can play without being a member.
